bug.summary: Sorting a numeric hyperparameter column or metric column sorts lexicographically instead of numerically.
bug.description: See title. Numeric columns should be sorted numerically, not lexicographically. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45394583/79123377-05775980-7d68-11ea-8364-d2981198d728.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/WillNichols726>@WillNichols726</denchmark-link> you are correct. This is an outcome of actually storing the hyper-parameters as text (casting is done in real-time). Extending the capabilities of the hyper-parameter is on the to do list (e.g. adding type restrictions, comment/help, parameter sections etc.) That said, I would like to have this bug sorted ;)
